mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO (USER_NO, USER_KO_NAME, USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_BIRTH, USER_PHONE, USER_GENDER, USER_EN_NAME, USER_PROFILE_IMAGE, USER_EMAIL) values(USER_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{userKoName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userEnName}, null, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO as userNo, USER_KO_NAME as userKoName, USER_ID as userId, USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, USER_BIRTH as userPassword, USER_PHONE as userPhone, USER_GENDER as userGender, USER_EN_NAME as userEnName, USER_EMAIL as userEmail FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
